articles.author: Tom Warren
articles.title: Sony's first PS5 sale brings steep price drops to UK, Germany, India, and beyond - The Verge
articles.description: Sony is running a summer promotion on the PS5. In the UK the console has dropped to £399.99, just ahead of a rumored PS5 Slim launch.
articles.content:

articles.title: Donald Trump faces further charges in Mar-a-Lago documents inquiry - BBC

articles.content:

articles.title: Aeolus: 'Impossible satellite' ready to fall to Earth - BBC
articles.description: One of the most challenging space missions launched by Europe is about to come out of the sky.
articles.content:
A British-built spacecraft is expected to fall to Earth later on Friday, after completing a transformative mission to map the planet's winds.

articles.title: Avian flu warning to tourists as birds face 'catastrophe' - BBC
